name: Ext_R5_AuditEvent_so_site
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.AuditEvent.source.site for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents AuditEvent.source.site from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AuditEvent|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Logical source location within the enterprise
element.definition: Logical source location within the healthcare enterprise network.  For example, a hospital or other provider location within a multi-entity provider group.
element.comment: `AuditEvent.source.site` maps to R4 `AuditEvent.source.site`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
